metadata.title: CVE-2021-21173 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Side-channel information leakage in Network Internals in Google Chromeprior to 89.0.4389.72 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin datavia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
